body.value:
There are many benefits that accompany your membership in the PCRC, the opportunity to serve on a PCRC committee/task force is one of the many.  As a member, there are several expectations for demonstrating your commitment to the PCRC which include the following options:

  • participate as an active committee/task force member, or
  • contribute to the scientific development of PCRC by providing expertise, or
  • contribute to clinical studies through study development or conduct
[button url="https://airtable.com/shrUkrjr97EhEEAYB" size="" color="green" target="_blank"]Apply Here - Rolling Applications Accepted[/button]

Potential Committee/Task Force Openings

(please note you must be a PCRC member to apply)

 

 

Steering Committee

Sets the strategic direction of the PCRC; holds responsibility for high-level decisions that determine PCRC structure/function.  PCRC members applying to this committee should be full members with investigative and leadership experience.

Jean Kutner, Christine Ritchie, and Kathryn Pollak

Scientific Review Committee

Evaluates proposals for new research, and makes recommendations to the Steering Committee regarding which studies to support through the PCRC, including prioritization and queuing. 

Thomas LeBlanc

Membership Committee

Evaluates all new member applications, makes recommendations to SC; Develops & monitors compliance with Membership Guidelines.

Dena Schulman-Green

Publication Committee

Reviews all manuscripts submitted on behalf of the PCRC, ensures quality and adherence to the Authorship Protocol.

Margaret (Meg) Campbell

Annual Investigator Meeting (AIM) Task Force

To organize and plan the PCRC Annual Investigator meetings.

Terrah Akard

Ad-hoc SRC Reviewers

Thomas LeBlanc

Ad hoc Pilot Grant Reviewers

Christine Ritchie

Application Process

Applications are accepted on a rolling basis as needs arise, to be considered please complete the application here:

[button url="https://airtable.com/shrUkrjr97EhEEAYB" size="" color="green" target="_blank"]Apply Here[/button]
Approval Process
  • Online Membership Application submitted
  • Committee/Task force leadership Review & Recommendations
  • Executive and Steering Committee Review /Approval
  • Steering Committee membership is by vote of the PCRC membership
  • Notification
  • New Member On-boarding

General questions may be sent to pcrc@ucdenver.edu.
